quotes.quote: Chaudhvin ka chand ho, ya aaftaab ho? Jo bhi ho tum khuda ki kasam, lajawab ho.
Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy? Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality.
Tere bina zindagi se koi, shikwa, toh nahi. Tere bina zindagi bhi lekin, zindagi, toh nahi.
Yesterday, all my troubles seemed so far away. Now it looks as though they're here to stay.
Papa kehte hain bada naam karega, beta hamara aisa kaam karega. Magar yeh toh koi na jaane.
There's a lady who's sure all that glitters is gold and she's buying a stairway to heaven.
Tujhe dekha toh yeh jaana sanam, pyaar hota hai deewana sanam. Ab yahan se kahan jaayein hum.
Imagine there's no heaven, it's easy if you try. No hell below us, above us only sky.
Jinke sar ho ishq ki chhaon, paanv ke neeche jannat hogi. Chal chaiyya chaiyya chaiyya chaiyya.
We're just two lost souls swimming in a fish bowl, year after year, running over the same old ground.
Kal ho naa ho. Har ghadi badal rahi hai roop zindagi, chaanv hai kabhi, kabhi hai dhoop zindagi.
You can check out any time you like, but you can never leave. Welcome to the Hotel California.
Hothon se chhu lo tum, mera geet amar kar do. Ban jaao meet mere, meri preet amar kar do.
Come writers and critics who prophesize with your pen and keep your eyes wide, the chance won't come again.
Pehla nasha, pehla khumaar, naya pyaar hai naya intezaar. Kar loon main kya apna haal, ae dil-e-bekaraar.
I see a red door and I want it painted black. No colors anymore, I want them to turn black.
Chingari koi bhadke, toh sawan use bujhaye. Sawan jo agan lagaye, use kaun bujhaye? Pathjhad jo baag ujaade.
Hello, darkness, my old friend, I've come to talk with you again, because a vision softly creeping.
Maa, tujhe salaam. Vande Mataram. Yahan vahan saara jahan dekh liya, kahin bhi tere jaisa koi nahi hai.
It's the eye of the tiger, it's the thrill of the fight, rising up to the challenge of our rival.
Channa Mereya, mereya. Channa Mereya, mereya beliya. O piya. Mehfil mein teri, hum na rahein jo, gham toh nahi.
I am just a poor boy, though my story's seldom told. I have squandered my resistance for some promises.
Tum paas aaye, yun muskuraye, tumne na jaane kya sapne dikhaye. Ab toh mera dil, jaage na sota hai.
You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us.
O Sanam, mohabbat ki kasam, milke bichad na to dastoor ho gaya. Yadon me teri main to choor ho gaya.
Ticking away the moments that make up a dull day, you fritter and waste the hours in an offhand way.
Tumse hi din hota hai, surmaiye shaam aati hai, tumse hi, tumse hi. Har ghadi saans aati hai.
I'm a rolling thunder, a pouring rain. I'm comin' on like a hurricane, my lightning's flashing across the sky.
Dil diyan gallan, karange naal naal beh ke. Ankh naale ankh nu mila ke. Tenu lakhan ton chupa ke rakhaan.
Take my hand, we'll make it, I swear. Whoa, livin' on a prayer. We will make it I swear.
Aankhon mein teri, ajab si, ajab si, adayein hain. Dil ko bana dein jo patang, saansein yeh teri.
Billie Jean is not my lover, she's just a girl who claims that I am the one, but the kid is not my son.
Jaadu hai nasha hai, madhoshiyan hai. Tujhko bhula ke ab jaaun kahan. Dekhti hai jis tarah se teri nazrein.
When the night has come and the land is dark, and the moon is the only light we will see.
Give me some sunshine, give me some rain. Give me another chance, I wanna grow up once again.
Ground Control to Major Tom, your circuit's dead, there's something wrong. Can you hear me, Major Tom?
Tere mast mast do nain, mere dil ka le gaye chain. Mere dil ka le gaye chain, tere mast mast do nain.
At first I was afraid, I was petrified. Kept thinkin' I could never live without you by my side.
Tu hi meri shab hai, subha hai, tu hi din hai mera. Tu hi mera rab hai, jahaan hai.
When I find myself in times of trouble, Mother Mary comes to me, speaking words of wisdom, let it be.
Bin tere, bin tere, bin tere. Koi khalish hai hawayon mein bin tere. Ajnabi se huye hain kyun pal.
And in the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make. Her majesty's a pretty nice girl.
Roobaroo, roshni hai. Roobaroo, har jagah. Jo kal tha yahan, hai abhi bhi yahan, gum hua kuch nahi.
Freedom's just another word for nothin' left to lose. Nothin', don't mean nothin' hon' if it ain't free.
Kyun main jaagoon, jab tu sota hai. Aasmaan bhi rota hai. Kyun main jaagoon, jaagoon, jaagoon. Why do I stay awake?
There is a house in New Orleans they call the Rising Sun, and it's been the ruin of many a poor boy.
Saadda haq, aithe rakh. Na na na na. O Eco-friendly, nature-de-rakhwale. O Fowler-ke-chimmache, Goggle-paa-ke-ghumnewale.
I've paid my dues, time after time. I've done my sentence, but committed no crime and made bad mistakes.
Bheegi bheegi si hai raatein, bheegi bheegi yaadein, bheegi bheegi baatein. Aankhon mein kaisi nami hai. Aah ha ha ha.
You can't always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you might find you get what you need.
O, meri soni, meri tamanna, jhooth nahi hai mera pyaar. Deewane se ho gayi galti, jaane do yaar.
Show a little faith, there's magic in the night. You ain't a beauty, but hey, you're alright.
Dil se re. Dil se re. Dil toh aakhir dil hai na, meethi si mushkil hai na, piya piya.
Just a small-town girl, livin' in a lonely world. She took the midnight train goin' anywhere.
Kabira maan jaa, Kabira maan jaa. Aaja tujhko pukaare teri parchaiyan. Kaisa tu hai re nirmohi, kaisa harjaaiya.
With the lights out, it's less dangerous. Here we are now, entertain us. I feel stupid and contagious.
Pyar hua, ikrar hua hai, pyar se phir kyun darta hai dil. Kehta hai dil, rasta mushkil, maloom nahi hai kahan manzil.
You've got to know when to hold 'em, know when to fold 'em, know when to walk away.
Mera joota hai Japani, yeh patloon Englishtani. Sar pe laal topi Roosi, phir bhi dil hai Hindustani.
There must be some kind of way out of here, said the joker to the thief, there's too much confusion.
Zindagi ek safar hai suhana, yahan kal kya ho kisne jaana. Chand taaron se chalna hai aage.
I'm still standing better than I ever did. Looking like a true survivor, feeling like a little kid.
Main tenu samjhawan ki, na tere bina lagda jee. Tu ki jaane pyaar mera, main karoon intezar tera.
You are the dancing queen, young and sweet, only seventeen. Dancing queen, feel the beat from the tambourine.
Kabhi kabhi mere dil mein khayal aata hai, ki jaise tujhko banaya gaya hai mere liye.
The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, nothing is guaranteed.
Chalte chalte, mere yeh geet yaad rakhna. Kabhi alvida na kehna. Rote hanste, bas yunhi tum gungunate rehna.
The screen door slams, Mary's dress sways. Like a vision she dances across the porch as the radio plays.
O saathi re, tere bina bhi kya jeena. Phoolon mein, kaliyon mein, sapno ki galiyon mein, tere bina kuch kahin na.
In my life, I love you more. Though I know I'll never lose affection for people and things before.
Tum hi ho. Ab tum hi ho, zindagi ab tum hi ho. Chain bhi, mera dard bhi, meri aashiqui ab tum hi ho.
Look, if you had one shot or one opportunity to seize everything you ever wanted in one single moment.
Main agar kahoon, tumsa haseen, kaayanaat mein nahi hai kahin. Taareef yeh bhi toh, sach hai kuch bhi nahi.
I get by with a little help from my friends. Mm, get high with a little help from my friends.
Dooba dooba rehta hoon yaadon mein teri, dewana ban gaya hoon main chahat mein teri. Ab din guzarte nahi.
Do you remember the 21st night of September? Love was changin' the minds of pretenders, while chasin' clouds away.
Ek ladki ko dekha toh aisa laga, jaise khilta gulaab, jaise shayar ka khwaab, jaise ujli kiran.
It was a teenage wedding and the old folks wished them well. You could see Pierre did truly love the mademoiselle.
Muskurane ki wajah tum ho, gungunane ki wajah tum ho. Jiya jaaye na, jaaye na, jaaye na, o re piya re.
You make me feel like a natural woman. When my soul was in the lost and found, you came along to claim it.
Ajeeb daastaan hai yeh, kahan shuru kahan khatam. Yeh manzilein hain kaunsi, na woh samajh sake na hum.
Oh, somewhere over the rainbow, way up high. There's a land that I heard of once in a lullaby.
Yeh dosti, hum nahi todenge. Todenge dam magar, tera saath na chhodenge. Meri jeet teri jeet, teri haar meri haar.
You are the sunshine of my life, that's why I'll always be around. You are the apple of my eye.
Lag jaa gale, ki phir yeh haseen raat ho na ho. Shaayad phir is janam mein mulaqaat ho na ho.
Who are you to judge the life I live? I know I'm not perfect and I don't live to be.
Pardesi, pardesi, jaana nahi. Mujhe chhod ke, mujhe chhod ke. Pardesi mere yaara, wada nibhana.
There is a crack, a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in. That's how the light gets in.
Piyu bole, piya bole, kya yeh bole jaanu na. Jiya dole, haule haule, kyun yeh dole jaanu na.
I hurt myself today to see if I still feel. I focus on the pain, the only thing that's real.
Abhi mujh mein kahin, baaqi thodi si hai zindagi. Jagi dhadkan nayi, jaana zinda hoon main toh abhi.
But I'm a creep, I'm a weirdo. What the hell am I doin' here? I don't belong here.
Jai ho, jai ho. Aaja aaja jind shamiyane ke tale. Aaja jariwale nile aasman ke tale. Jai ho.
Lights will guide you home and ignite your bones, and I will try, I will try to fix you.
